sentences.sentence: The department is reviewing its policy with regard to immunization.
sentences.translation: 该部门正在重新审查其有关免疫注射的政策。

sentences.sentence: Immunization coverage against fatal diseases has increased to 99% in some countries.
sentences.translation: 在一些国家致命疾病免疫注射的覆盖面已达到99%。

sentences.sentence: Routine childhood immunization will then sustain this achievement.
sentences.translation: 随后将通过常规儿童期免疫来维持这一成就。
